docs.snippet: LONDON, Dec. 14--The Preparatory Commission tied itself today in a tight procedural knot on how to vote for a permanent home for the United Nations Organization. The issue between a straight ballot on a United States site or a secret vote on specific...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 14--The Preparatory Commission tied itself today in a tight procedural knot on how to vote for a permanent home for the United Nations Organization. The issue between a straight ballot on a United States site or a secret vote on specific sites anywhere in the world wound up in a deadlock.

docs.snippet: PRINCETON, N.J., Dec. 16-- Dr. Edwin Walter Kemmerer, noted monetary expert, who had been called upon by fourteen governments for advice in reorganizing their monetary systems, died this morning in the Princeton Hospital after a brief illness.
